universe_note: Universe limited to provided packets (NASDAQ/NYSE/NGM listings). Liquidity gate applied: avg_dollar_volume_20d >= 50,000,000 and price >= 2. Exclusion checks for >15% last 5 trading days and dated catalysts could not be fully validated from packets (no 5-day return field; most earnings dates unknown). Options and social sentiment data unavailable in all packets; options score capped at 3.0 and sentiment score capped at 4.0 per rules.

top5.name: Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Deal/proxy-fight narrative fades or turns adverse (e.g., legal setbacks), and price loses short-term trend support (falls back below key moving averages).

primary_catalyst.title: Hostile bid / proxy fight escalation (newsflow-driven catalyst)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Multiple same-day reports indicate Paramount/Skydance filed suit and is pursuing a proxy fight tied to a hostile bid involving Warner Bros. Discovery, which can drive rapid repricing via M&A probability and governance outcomes.

sources.title: Paramount Sues Warner Bros., Plans Proxy Fight. The Ellisons Aren’t Giving Up.
Paramount sues in hostile bid to buy Warner Bros Discover
Paramount Plans Proxy Fight to Push Hostile Warner Bid

risk_factors: M&A/proxy-fight headlines can reverse quickly; legal actions add binary risk and timing uncertainty.
Media/streaming sector sentiment and broader market risk can overwhelm deal-driven moves.

Catalyst is not a scheduled dated event; timing is headline-driven and uncertain.
Earnings date unknown; cannot assess proximity vs 7-trading-day horizon.

top5.name: Cadence Bank

target.bear_case_note: Merger-arb spread compresses/expands against the position due to regulatory/closing timing changes or market risk-off; price fails to hold near highs.

primary_catalyst.title: Huntington–Cadence merger process milestone (shareholder approval / regulatory updates)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Merger-related milestones can tighten/shift the deal spread and trigger repricing; multiple reports cite shareholder approval and prior regulatory approval, keeping near-term newsflow active.

sources.title: Cadence Bank, Huntington Bancshares get regulatory approval for merger
Huntington Secures OCC Regulatory Green Light for Cadence Merger

risk_factors: Merger-arbitrage dynamics: upside may be capped by deal terms; downside can be sharp on delay/break risk.
Rate/financials beta: macro shocks can move the stock independent of deal progress.

top5.name: Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies Corporation

target.bear_case_note: Order/news catalyst fades and price stalls near highs; failure to sustain trend above short-term moving averages.

primary_catalyst.title: Large contract award headline (MTA order)
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: A large disclosed order can shift near-term revenue visibility and sentiment, often triggering follow-through buying when the stock is already near highs.

sources.title: Wabtec Kicks Off 2026 With $386 Million Order From New York's MTA
Here's Why Investors Should Bet on Wabtec Stock Right Now

risk_factors: Contract award may be partially priced quickly; follow-through depends on guidance/financial framing not provided in packet.
Industrials can be sensitive to macro data and rates; risk-off tape can cap upside.

top5.name: Amphenol Corporation

target.bear_case_note: Breakout attempt fails (rejection near highs) and the stock loses momentum/AI-data-center narrative bid.

primary_catalyst.title: AI/data-center breakout narrative + board/newsflow
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Recent headlines frame APH as an AI data-center beneficiary 'breaking out' and highlight board news, which can sustain momentum flows over the next week if market risk remains supportive.

sources.title: AI Data Center Leader Amphenol Is Breaking Out In Heavy Volume
What Amphenol (APH)'s Addition of Linde CEO Sanjiv Lamba to Its Board Means For Shareholders

risk_factors: AI/semis-infrastructure factor risk: crowded positioning can lead to sharp pullbacks on macro/rates.
Catalyst is narrative-driven rather than a dated event; momentum may fade without incremental news.

top5.name: Viavi Solutions Inc.

target.bear_case_note: Product-launch narrative fails to translate into orders/guidance; stock loses trend support and reverts after run-up.

primary_catalyst.title: Product/newsflow: AR RF Viewer + Hollow Core Fiber tools launch narrative
primary_catalyst.why_it_matters: Recent coverage highlights new tools and a 'launch' narrative; small/mid-cap tech names near highs can move quickly on incremental product adoption headlines.

sources.title: How New AR RF Viewer And Hollow Core Fiber Tools At Viavi Solutions (VIAV) Have Changed Its Investment Story
A Look At Viavi Solutions (VIAV) Valuation After Strong Q3 Results And Hollow Core Fiber Launch

risk_factors: Product-news catalysts can be incremental and may not drive a sustained re-rating without quantified bookings/backlog.
Higher realized volatility increases whipsaw risk; small/mid-cap tech can gap on market moves.
